directions.step:
Date: Thu, 02 May 1996 21:14:00 -0400
From: Walt Gray <waltgray@mnsinc.com>
Brown chops with melted butter in large skillet. Place them in greased baking dish. Place a thin slice of lemon on each. Sprinkle with salt and pepper. Spread brown sugar over chops, then tomato sauce. Cover and bake 1-1/4 hours at 350F.
